alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 5:22AM CST until March 04 at 1:36PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tennessee River AT Florence affecting Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River AT Florence. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Alabama State Highway 20 is flooded at the underpass below U.S. Highways 43 and 72. The underpass will likely be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM CST Wednesday was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 13.4 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 02/04/1932. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
